rules_text:
When Bot Depot enters, surveil 2. [i](Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them into your graveyard and the rest on top of your library in any order.)[/i]
Whenever one or more cards are put into your graveyard from anywhere other than the battlefield, create a 1/1 colorless Construct artifact creature token. This ability triggers only once each turn.
